TestGroupDocumentation.Title: minInclusive4 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a minInclusive-4.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a positiveInteger restricted SimpleType with minInclusive value 35874103269231083502.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML positiveInteger minInclusive-4.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls minInclusive-4-1.xml document which specifies valid value 35874103269231083502 for the positiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-positiveInteger-minInclusive-4 element, sets the values: 35874103269231083502, 35874103269231083503, 358741032692310835020 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML positiveInteger minInclusive-4.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls minInclusive-4-1.xml document which specifies valid value 35874103269231083502 for the positiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-positiveInteger-minInclusive-4 element, sets the values: 35874103269231083501, 3587410326, 1, 0, -358741032692310835023 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML positiveInteger minInclusive-4.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of positiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-positiveInteger-minInclusive-4 type, sets the values: 35874103269231083502, 35874103269231083503, 358741032692310835020 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML positiveInteger minInclusive-4.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of positiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-positiveInteger-minInclusive-4 type, sets the values: 35874103269231083501, 3587410326, 1, 0, -358741032692310835023 and expects validation to fail.
